function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharing information about food preparation and the people behind the business may lead to an increased risk of spreading contagious diseases if proper hygiene and safety practices are not followed.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of foodborne illness outbreaks and transmission of contagious diseases among consumers.","Mitigation":"Implement strict food safety practices, regular sanitation of food trucks, and staff training on hygiene and sanitation measures.","Technologies":"Food safety management systems, contactless payment systems, and digital health monitoring tools.","People":"Consumers, food truck staff, and anyone who consumes food from the food trucks.","Owner":"Food truck operators, local health authorities, and regulatory agencies."},{"Description":"Vicariously participating in everyday business and increasing perceived transparency may lead to complacency in following social distancing and health guidelines, risking the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher risk of transmission of contagious diseases and non-compliance with public health guidelines.","Mitigation":"Education and communication with customers about the importance of continued adherence to social distancing guidelines, and emphasizing the need for caution even when interacting with businesses.","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms, customer engagement tools, and location-based social distancing monitoring systems.","People":"Consumers, food truck operators, and local community members.","Owner":"Food truck operators, public health authorities, and local community organizations."},{"Description":"Enabling customers to interact with each other while respecting social distancing guidelines may lead to challenges in maintaining strict adherence to the guidelines, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential breaches in social distancing guidelines, leading to increased risk of spreading contagious diseases among customers.","Mitigation":"Implement clear signage and markers for social distancing, regular monitoring of customer behavior, and staff training on managing customer interactions while maintaining safety measures.","Technologies":"Location-based monitoring systems, customer flow management tools, and digital communication for customer guidance.","People":"Customers, food truck operators, and anyone present at the food truck locations.","Owner":"Food truck operators, local authorities, and community event organizers."}]}
